comments:
Image save not working, get unsupported format error when attempting to save a 
*.jpg file.

Buid was not compiling and linking in the jpeg save support.  This has been 
fixed.  Also updated the junit suite to actually run the image save tests.  The 
tests were there, but not being run.

The fix had been made only in the Expanded project. However, 
it was just built in the converged eSWT fragments a couple hours ago. You will
need to pull the new binaries from CVS. For win32, go to: 

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/org.eclipse.ercp/org.eclipse.ercp.swt.win32/os/win32/x86/eswt-converged.dll?cvsroot=Technology_Project

and

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/org.eclipse.ercp/org.eclipse.ercp.swt.win32/ws/win32/eswt-converged.jar?cvsroot=Technology_Project

Image saving works with the current cvs version.

Thanks for the fix!
